channel.title: Playwrights on That's it ! Code Snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Playwrights on That's it ! Code Snippets

item.title: Playwright >> Tips and Tricks (1)
item.description: This tutorial will show you the code example that how to use Playwright to get all cookies, get all links in the page, get all links containing specific string/text, click buttons, click links, click all links in new tabs (click multiple elements), get all pages/tabs, get all attributes of element, customize click timeout, click element if it exists, click specific position, click and drag (drag and drop).

item.title: Playwright >> Getting and setting (text, html, input value, attribute, href, localstorage, cookie, user agent, viewport/resolution/window size, and headers)
item.description:
This tutorial will show you the code example that how to get text, html, input value, attribute, href of element, and how to get the localstorage, cookie.
And show you the code example that how to set localstorage, cookie, input value of textbox, user agent, viewport/resolution/window size, and custom headers of the browser.

item.title: Playwright >> Find, Locate, Select Elements/Tags using Playwright
item.description:
This tutorial will explain some code examples about how to find/locate/select elements containing specified text or child element, loop the locator results, find first or last element, get parent or child element, get elements by class, attribute or id using Playwright (Python library).

Playwright python version: 1.22

item.title: Playwright Example >> AutoComplete
item.description: In this article, we will use Playwright (Python version) to fill the Textbox by using Autocomplete feature.

item.title: Playwright Example >> RadioButton
item.description: In this article, we will use Playwright (Python version) to check and toggle Radio buttons on the web page.

item.title: Playwright Example >> Download File
item.description: In this article, we will use Playwright (Python version) to download a file automatically and save it to specified path.

item.title: Playwright Example >> Upload Files
item.description: In this article, we will use Playwright (Python version) to upload file automatically.

item.title: Playwright Example >> Checkbox
item.description: In this article, we will use Playwright (Python version) to check checkbox in the web form. And uncheck it.

item.title: Playwright Example >> TextBox
item.description: In this article, we will use Playwright (Python version) to fill textbox in the web form. And get the text value of text box.

item.title: Playwright >> Save authentication state and Login atuomatically
item.description: In the previous article, we introduced the basic usage of Playwright. In this article, we will talk about some advanced usage like auto-login and save authentication states like cookies or tokens.

item.title: Playwright >> Basic Usage
item.description:
Playwright is a Node.js library to automate Chromium, Firefox and WebKit with a single API. Playwright is built to enable cross-browser web automation that is ever-green, capable, reliable and fast.

In this article, we will go through basic usage of Playwright.
